name: Michael Lampis
content: Homepage of Michael Lampis Home Research Teaching My name is Michael Lampis. I am a MaÃ®tre de confÃ©rences HDR (assistant professor) at LAMSADE, Universite Paris Dauphine. Before coming to Paris I held post-doc positions at the Research Institute for Mathematical Sciences of Kyoto University, working under the supervision of Prof. Kazuhisa Makino, and at Johan Hastad's group at KTH, Stockholm. I received my PhD from the Computer Science program of the Graduate Center of the City University of New York. My advisor was Amotz Bar-Noy. Feel free to contact me at: michail.lampis AT dauphine.fr Check out a short presentation about my research! (in Japanese)
